text: Soshite kare-ra wa,`gōka ga watashi-tachi ni fureru no wa, nan'nichi ka no ma ni suginaidearou.' To iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa, arrā to yakusoku o musunda to iu no ka. Sorenara arrā wa kesshite hayaku sa renaidearou. Soretomo anata gata wa, arrā ni tsuite shiri mo shinai koto o Ro ni shiyou to suru no ka
